markdownRemark.html:
At Sāvatthī.

“Mendicants, there are these four meditators. What four?

One meditator is skilled in emerging from immersion but not in gladdening the mind for immersion. …”

(These seven discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)

SN.34.35–40. Kallitamūlakaārammaṇasuttādichakka (“Six on Gladdening and Support, Etc.“)
